short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e: 小秋搜索提供了多种类型的聚合搜索，能够更精确的搜索资源，节省跨平台的搜索时间。同时 [小秋搜索-标签页] 模仿手机桌面，可进行多桌面切换并对每个网站设置快捷菜单，也是个非常好用的浏览器主页
short.en: Xiaoqiu Search provides multiple types of aggregate search, which can more accurately search resources and save cross platform…

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e:
*最新版本已完成小秋AI-chatGPT的集成，可实现AI聚合搜索，体验跨时代的搜索服务

随着互联网孤岛化，单一搜索引擎难以搜到有用的资源。小秋搜索提供了多种类型的聚合搜索，能够更精确的搜索资源，节省跨平台的搜索时间。 
小秋搜索提供了多种类型的聚合搜索，能够更精确的搜索资源，节省跨平台的搜索时间。
当前支持【图片】、【视频】、【资源】、【资讯】、【学术】、【代码】的聚合搜索，并支持 【网站 + 搜索词】 的方式进行快捷搜索。
同时 [小秋搜索-标签页] 模仿手机桌面，可进行多桌面切换并对每个网站设置快捷菜单。聚合多个搜索引擎并提供个性化背景等功能，也是个非常好用的浏览器主页~

扩展所需权限：
更改打开新标签页时看到的页面
读取浏览网站用于添加站点

在线体验：https://www.xqss.link
扩展下载：https://www.xqss.link/website
小秋AI：https://www.xqai.net
long.en:
With the islanding of the Internet, it is difficult for a single search engine to find useful resources. Xiaoqiu Search provides multiple types of aggregate search, which can more accurately search resources and save cross platform search time.
Xiaoqiu Search provides multiple types of aggregate search, which can more accurately search resources and save cross platform search time.
Currently, it supports aggregate search of [pictures], [videos], [resources], [information], [academic] and [code], and supports quick search by [website+search term].
At the same time, [Xiaoqiu Search - Tab] imitates the mobile desktop to switch multiple desktops and set shortcut menus for each website. Aggregates multiple search engines and provides personalized background and other functions. It is also a very useful browser homepage~
Online experience: https://www.xqss.link/
Extended download: https://www.xqss.link/website
